feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [SBG3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack S325B01
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 3, 2024, 03:30 - 04:00 UTC

Dec 6, 01:48 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/01/2023 03:30 UTC
End time : 03/01/2023 04:00 UTC
Service impact : vRack Servers in rack S325B01 will be unavailable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.
